attributes.action: Kim's Voice for better mental health services
attributes.additional_details:
Kim's Voice is a campaign for better mental health services in the UK set up in memory of Kimberley  Jane Boylin who committed suicide in may 2009.
www.facebook.com/kimsvoiceSAF
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3E5iH2QoVrY - Our official campaign video!

Kim's voice already has backing from Keith Towler the children's commissioner of Wales and David Hanson Flintshire MP.

we are fighting for more funding in the mental health sector with three main aims;
.For mental health services to be person centred.
.For mental health services work on a crisis prevention basis.
.For a specific mental health service to be set up for young people 16-25 that recognises that they have different needs to a fully fledged, matured adult.

with a overall aim of more funding within the mental health sector in order to save people from suicide like my sister was wrongfully led to. suicide is 100% preventable so lets make sure we prevent it as much as we can!

rejection.details: The provision of health services in Wales has been devolved to the Welsh Government and hence the Secretary of State for Wales is unable to intervene.
